body: 1. How do you friend people?2. My stats won't load, even if I leave my computer on overnight. Glitch, maybe? If so, could it be fixed?3. Thank you for the attention! BTW, check out some of m kits, sometime.

replies.body:
To friend someone, you must be on the old forums.
Click here : http://old.avicus.net/forums
Then you go to the player which you wish to friend and click "add friend".
